description: In this inspirational buddy comedy, a young shut-in and his caregiver take a road trip in search of landmarks, but end up finding hope and friendship.

description: Get up close and personal with avalanches, fiery volcanoes and other natural cataclysms, and learn why some choose to live in their destructive paths.

description: The life of a bank manager is turned upside down when a friend from his past manipulates him into faking his own death and taking off on an adventure.

description: Ali Wong's stand up special delves into her sexual adventures, hoarding, the rocky road to pregnancy, and why feminism is terrible.

title: Hush
description: A deaf writer who retreated into the woods to live a solitary life must fight for her life in silence when a masked killer appears in her window.

title: Cyborg 009 VS Devilman
description: When a Black Ghost scientist releases newly modified cyborgs and mysterious demons appear in Tokyo, the worlds of "Devilman" and "Cyborg 009" meet.

title: Frank and Cindy
description: Frank was a rising pop star when he married Cindy, but decades of dashed dreams and alcoholism have left the pair struggling to find happiness.

title: Frank and Cindy
description: A student filmmaker vengefully turns his camera on his bitter mom and washed-up rock star stepdad in this dramedy based on a documentary.

title: Ricardo O'Farrill Abrazo Genial

title: 6 Years
description: As a volatile young couple who have been together for six years approach college graduation, unexpected career opportunities threaten their future.

title: Demetri Martin: Live (At the Time)

description: In order to keep her job at a biomedical engineering firm that prizes youth, a middle-aged woman must submit to a drastic experimental procedure.

description: Follow the adventures of superspy Danger Mouse and his bumbling sidekick, Penfold, as they jet around the world foiling their enemies' evil plots.

title: Johnny Test

description: Plucky lizard Oscar spends his time trying to avoid the hazards of the desert, including marauding chickens and bumbling adversaries.

description: Stand-up comedian and TV star Aziz Ansari ("Parks and Recreation") delivers his sharp-witted take on immigrants, relationships and the food industry.

title: My Own Man
description: When a man discovers he will be the father to a boy, his fear and insecurities send him on an emotional, humorous quest for his own manhood.

description: The team behind the searing documentary reveals what inspired them to tell the story of Virunga and the lethal fight to save the gorillas' sanctuary.

description: Smart and brazen comedian Iliza Shlesinger applies her fresh, laugh-out-loud perspective to the universal struggles between men and women.

description: It's Christmas, and BoJack wants nothing to do with it. Then Todd shows up with a giant candy cane and an old "Horsin' Around" Christmas episode.

title: Bill Burr: I'm Sorry You Feel That Way
description: Bill Burr escapes the zombie apocalypse, explores how rom-coms ruin great sex and explains how too many childhood hugs may be the downfall of man.

title: Lilyhammer
description: After testifying against the Mafia, ex-gangster Frank Tagliano enters witness protection and asks to be sent to Norway.

title: Goosebumps
description: R.L. Stine's tales take on a life of their own in a series that combines original stories with adaptations drawn from the popular books.

title: Virunga
description: The Oscar-nominated true story of the rangers risking their lives to save Africa's most precious national park and its endangered gorillas.

description: The courageous investigators of Human Rights Watch's Emergencies Team risk their lives to document unlawful attacks on civilians by brutal dictators.

title: Wyatt Cenac: Brooklyn

title: Chelsea Handler: Uganda Be Kidding Me Live
description: In her first Netflix stand-up comedy special, Chelsea Handler recounts her African adventures (and provides hilarious photographic evidence).

description: Werner Herzog chronicles the devastating consequences of texting and driving. The film examines how lives can be forever altered by a trivial text.

title: The Borgias
description: Follow the lives of the notorious Borgia family, a clan headed by plotting patriarch Rodrigo and his beautiful but treacherous daughter, Lucrezia.

title: Mitt
description: The real Mitt Romney is revealed in this documentary that goes beyond the sound bites with unprecedented access to his 2012 presidential campaign.

title: The Square
description: This Emmy-winning, street-level view of the 2011 Egyptian Revolution captures the astonishing uprising that led to the collapse of two governments.

title: Shrek the Musical
description: The greatest fairy tale never told comes to life in this colorful, song-filled, Tony Award-winning Broadway production based on the hit movie.

title: The Short Game
description: They are fiercely competitive athletes, determined to become champions on one of the world's toughest golf courses. And they're still in grade school.

title: Aziz Ansari: Buried Alive
description: "Parks and Recreation" star Aziz Ansari takes the stage to share his unfiltered views on adulthood, babies, marriage, love and more in the modern era.

title: The 4400

title: Breaking Bad
description: A high school chemistry teacher dying of cancer teams with a former student to secure his family's future by manufacturing and selling crystal meth.

title: A Stoning in Fulham County

description: A lawyer's husband is having an affair. When his mistress is found dead, he becomes the prime suspect – and his wife must take charge of his defense.

description: When high school football coach Charlie Wedemeyer is diagnosed with Lou Gehrig's disease, he perseveres in leading his team despite becoming disabled.

description: When their college-age daughter suddenly begins acting erratically and is diagnosed with schizophrenia, a desperate couple seeks treatment for her.

description: Laurie and Joseph are doctors who interview sexually abused children. With a lot of energy they track down a pedophile who has abused many toddlers.

description: A beauty pageant winner is stalked by a serial killer who kidnaps her sister and torments her family in this thriller based on a shocking true story.
